technologies.name: HTML5
technologies.desc: The backbone of web content. Semantic markup that structures your digital masterpiece.

technologies.name: CSS3
technologies.desc: Make it pretty! The magic wand that transforms bland HTML into stunning visual experiences.

technologies.name: JavaScript
technologies.desc: The soul of web interactivity. From simple clicks to complex applications - JS does it all!

technologies.name: React
technologies.desc: Component-based UI library that makes building interactive UIs as satisfying as LEGO blocks!

technologies.name: Vue.js
technologies.desc: Progressive framework that's approachable, versatile, and performant. Vue makes frontend fun!

technologies.name: Angular
technologies.desc: Full-featured framework for ambitious web apps. TypeScript-first and enterprise-ready!

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.desc: JavaScript's sophisticated cousin. Type safety that catches bugs before they catch you!

technologies.name: Sass/SCSS
technologies.desc: CSS with superpowers! Variables, nesting, and mixins make styling a breeze.

technologies.name: Tailwind CSS
technologies.desc: Utility-first CSS framework. Build beautiful designs without leaving your HTML!

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.desc: Responsive grid system and pre-built components. Rapid prototyping made simple!

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.desc: JavaScript on the server! Event-driven, non-blocking I/O that scales beautifully.

technologies.name: Express.js
technologies.desc: Minimalist web framework for Node.js. Fast, unopinionated, and flexible!

technologies.name: Python
technologies.desc: Readable, versatile, powerful. From web apps to AI - Python does it elegantly!

technologies.name: Django
technologies.desc: The web framework for perfectionists with deadlines. Batteries included!

technologies.name: Flask
technologies.desc: Micro framework with macro possibilities. Lightweight and extensible!

technologies.name: MongoDB
technologies.desc: Document-oriented NoSQL database. Flexible schemas for modern applications!

technologies.name: PostgreSQL
technologies.desc: Advanced open-source relational database. ACID compliance meets JSON flexibility!

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.desc: World's most popular open-source database. Reliable, fast, and battle-tested!

technologies.name: Redis
technologies.desc: In-memory data structure store. Caching, sessions, and real-time analytics!

technologies.name: REST API
technologies.desc: Representational State Transfer. Clean, stateless communication between systems!

technologies.name: GraphQL
technologies.desc: Query language for APIs. Ask for exactly what you need, nothing more!

technologies.name: Socket.io
technologies.desc: Real-time bidirectional event-based communication. WebSockets made simple!

technologies.name: JWT
technologies.desc: JSON Web Tokens for secure information transmission. Stateless authentication magic!

technologies.name: OAuth 2.0
technologies.desc: Industry-standard authorization framework. Secure third-party access control!

technologies.name: AWS
technologies.desc: Amazon's comprehensive cloud platform. From storage to AI - scale globally!

technologies.name: Docker
technologies.desc: Containerization platform. Package your app with all dependencies - run anywhere!

technologies.name: Kubernetes
technologies.desc: Container orchestration system. Automate deployment, scaling, and management!

technologies.name: Git
technologies.desc: Distributed version control system. Track changes, collaborate, never lose code!

technologies.name: GitHub
technologies.desc: Git repository hosting with collaboration features. Where code lives and thrives!

technologies.name: GitHub Actions
technologies.desc: Automate workflows from idea to production. CI/CD made simple and powerful!

technologies.name: Jenkins
technologies.desc: Extensible automation server. Build, test, and deploy with endless plugins!

technologies.name: Next.js
technologies.desc: React framework with server-side rendering. Full-stack React applications made easy!

technologies.name: Vercel
technologies.desc: Deploy frontend apps instantly. Git integration with global edge network!

technologies.name: Netlify
technologies.desc: Build, deploy, and manage modern web projects. JAMstack hosting platform!

technologies.name: Stripe
technologies.desc: Online payment processing for internet businesses. Accept payments globally!

technologies.name: PayPal
technologies.desc: Digital payment platform. Secure online money transfers and merchant services!

technologies.name: Solidity
technologies.desc: Smart contract programming language. Build decentralized applications on Ethereum!

technologies.name: Web3.js
technologies.desc: JavaScript library for Ethereum blockchain. Bridge web apps to decentralized world!

technologies.name: TensorFlow
technologies.desc: Open-source machine learning framework. From research to production ML models!

technologies.name: PyTorch
technologies.desc: Dynamic neural network framework. Research-friendly deep learning library!

technologies.name: WebSockets
technologies.desc: Low-latency, full-duplex communication over a single TCP connection. Ideal for chat, live dashboards, and multiplayer games. Use with native WebSocket API or libraries like Socket.io for fallbacks and reconnection logic.

technologies.name: WebRTC
technologies.desc: Peer-to-peer real-time media and data streams for audio, video and low-latency data channels. Used for video calls, screen sharing, and P2P data transfer. Involves signaling servers, NAT traversal (STUN/TURN), and codecs.

technologies.name: Load Balancing
technologies.desc: Distributes network or application traffic across multiple servers to improve availability and reliability. Covers algorithms (round-robin, least connections), sticky sessions, and health checks.

technologies.name: CDN
technologies.desc: Content Delivery Networks cache static assets at the edge to reduce latency and offload origin servers. Important for global performance, caching headers, and cache invalidation strategies.

technologies.name: Event Sourcing
technologies.desc: Modeling pattern where state changes are stored as a sequence of events. Enables audit logs, time-travel debugging, and rebuilding state; often paired with CQRS and message brokers.

technologies.name: WebTransport
technologies.desc: A modern transport API built on QUIC for reliable and unreliable streams for web applications. Emerging tech for performant client-server real-time data with lower latency than TCP-based transports.

technologies.name: Svelte
technologies.desc: A compiler-first UI framework that produces highly optimized vanilla JS. Great for lightweight apps with fast load times and minimal runtime overhead.

technologies.name: Astro
technologies.desc: Modern static-site builder focused on shipping less JavaScript by default. Works with multiple UI frameworks and is ideal for content-driven sites.

technologies.name: Storybook
technologies.desc: Component-driven development environment for building, testing, and documenting UI components in isolation. Essential for design systems.

technologies.name: FastAPI
technologies.desc: Modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.8+ based on standard Python type hints. Great for production APIs with automatic docs.

technologies.name: Terraform
technologies.desc: Infrastructure as Code tool to provision and manage cloud resources declaratively across multiple providers. A core skill for reproducible infra.

technologies.name: Jest
technologies.desc: Delightful JavaScript testing framework with a focus on simplicity. Widely used for unit and snapshot tests in React and Node projects.

technologies.name: Cypress
technologies.desc: End-to-end testing tool for the modern web. Fast, reliable, and developer-friendly for testing user flows in the browser.

technologies.name: Auth0
technologies.desc: Authentication and authorization-as-a-service. Simplifies login flows, social identity providers, and tokens so teams can focus on product.

technologies.name: Hugging Face
technologies.desc: A central hub for NLP and generative AI models, datasets, and tooling. Hugging Face simplifies using and deploying modern transformer models.

technologies.name: Razorpay
technologies.desc: India's leading payment gateway solution. Accept online payments, UPI, cards, wallets, and net banking with easy integration.

technologies.name: CircleCI
technologies.desc: Continuous integration and delivery platform. Automate testing, building, and deployment with powerful workflows.

technologies.name: Kong
technologies.desc: API gateway and service mesh platform. Manage, secure, and observe APIs and microservices at scale.

technologies.name: Postman
technologies.desc: API development environment. Test, document, and collaborate on APIs with powerful tools and automation.

technologies.name: Ruby
technologies.desc: Dynamic, object-oriented programming language. Known for its elegant syntax and productivity-focused design.

technologies.name: Spring Boot
technologies.desc: Java framework that simplifies Spring development. Auto-configuration and embedded servers for rapid application development.

technologies.name: Supabase
technologies.desc: Open-source Firebase alternative. Instant APIs, real-time subscriptions, and authentication built on PostgreSQL.

technologies.name: DigitalOcean
technologies.desc: Simple cloud infrastructure for developers. Droplets, managed databases, and Kubernetes clusters made easy.

technologies.name: Google Cloud
technologies.desc: Google's cloud platform offering compute, storage, AI/ML, and data analytics services at scale.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.desc: Web infrastructure and website security company. CDN, DDoS protection, and edge computing services.

technologies.name: ECS (AWS)
technologies.desc: Amazon Elastic Container Service. Fully managed container orchestration service for Docker containers.

technologies.name: GitLab
technologies.desc: Complete DevOps platform with Git repository management, CI/CD, and project management tools.

technologies.name: GitBucket
technologies.desc: Git web platform powered by Scala. Self-hosted Git service with GitHub-like interface and features.

technologies.name: GitLens
technologies.desc: VS Code extension that enhances Git capabilities. Git blame annotations, code lens, and repository insights.

technologies.name: Render
technologies.desc: Cloud platform for hosting web services, static sites, and databases. Simple deployments with Git integration.

technologies.name: Railway
technologies.desc: Infrastructure platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and deploy to the cloud.

technologies.name: AWS Amplify
technologies.desc: Full-stack development platform for building and deploying web and mobile applications on AWS.

technologies.name: Solana
technologies.desc: High-performance blockchain supporting decentralized apps and crypto-currencies. Fast, secure, and censorship-resistant.

technologies.name: Avalanche (AVAX)
technologies.desc: Platform for decentralized applications and custom blockchain networks. Fast, low-cost, and eco-friendly.

technologies.name: Chainlink
technologies.desc: Decentralized oracle network that provides real-world data to blockchain smart contracts securely.

technologies.name: Scikit-Learn
technologies.desc: Machine learning library for Python. Simple and efficient tools for data mining and analysis built on NumPy and SciPy.

technologies.name: OpenCV
technologies.desc: Open-source computer vision and machine learning software library. Image processing, video analysis, and AI vision tasks.

technologies.name: XGBoost
technologies.desc: Optimized gradient boosting framework. Highly efficient and flexible machine learning library for structured data.

technologies.name: Google Colab
technologies.desc: Free cloud-based Jupyter notebook environment for machine learning and data science with GPU/TPU support.

technologies.name: Microservices
technologies.desc: Architectural pattern that structures applications as a collection of loosely coupled, independently deployable services.

technologies.name: Low Level Design (LLD)
technologies.desc: Detailed design of individual components and classes. Focuses on implementation details, data structures, and algorithms.

technologies.name: High Level Design (HLD)
technologies.desc: System architecture design that defines the overall structure, components, and their interactions at a high level.

technologies.name: Functional Requirements
technologies.desc: Define what the system should do. Specify the behavior, features, and functionality that the system must provide.

technologies.name: Non-functional Requirements
technologies.desc: Define how the system should behave. Include performance, scalability, security, reliability, and usability constraints.

technologies.name: UML
technologies.desc: Unified Modeling Language for visualizing system design. Standard notation for class diagrams, sequence diagrams, and more.
